get_netcdf_subset_ecmwf_hres moduleÂ¶

Get NetCDF Subset ECMWF HRES CLI

This script allows the user to get a subset of ECMWF HRES data. This tool downloads the data in netCDF file format.

Usage:

$ get_netcdf_subset_ecmwf_hres.py -- params <str> --latbounds <float> <float> --lonbounds <float> <float> --out <str>

Options:
paramsstr or list of str

Single or comma seperated parameter short names

latboundsfirst float is for south and second float is for north

South and North latitude values space seperated

lonboundsfirst float is for south and second float is for north

West and East latitude values space seperated

outstr

output filename

dataex-client
